Tyrael: So, I gather that we are all here. Very well then. PREDACONS! 
WE ARE THE FIRST TRIPREDACUS STRIKERS! BY ORDER OF THE TRIPREDACUS 
HIGH COUNCIL, WE COME TO DISPOSE OF THE PREDACON RENEGADE NAMED 
MEGATRON! I, MAJOR TYRAEL, DEMAND THE WILLING SURRENDERING OF THE 
RENEGADE. IN THE OPPOSITE CASE, I SHALL CONSIDER THE REFUSAL AS AN ACT 
OF WAR BETWEEN US. WHAT SAY YOU?

He stopped firing, but didn't hold his troops back. He knew that the 
war would probably be the only venue, as Megatron was not likely to 
accept the terms.

Burrock, on the other hand, passed the surprise of surfacing in water 
and transformed. There would be some action now. He fired some darts.
